data.name: Answer1
data.value: Answer 1: Our hospital provides service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

data.name: Answer2
data.value: Answer 2: Our emergency service is available 24 hours a day for medical emergencies.

data.name: Answer3
data.value: Answer 3: Appointments can be made via our hospital's website or by phone.

data.name: Answer4
data.value: Answer 4: There are doctors from various specialties in our hospital. You can choose the appropriate doctor according to your needs.

data.name: Answer5
data.value: Answer 5: Our hospital provides services in general surgery, internal medicine, pediatrics, gynecology, orthopedics and many other fields.

data.name: Answer6
data.value: Answer 6: Yes, our hospital has a parking lot.

data.name: Answer7
data.value: Answer 7: Yes, there is a 24-hour pharmacy within our hospital.

data.name: Answer8
data.value: Answer 8: Yes, there is an opportunity for hospitalization in our hospital. You can get more information by contacting the relevant department.

data.name: HospitalConnection
data.value:
There are various ways to contact our hospital. Patients and visitors can reach us by phone, email, or through our website.
Phone number: 123 456 789 Email address: akdag@hospital.com Our website: www.akdag.com
Additionally, the physical address of our hospital is: İnönü Mah. Nizamiye Caddesi No:1-9, Şişli / Istanbul
We would be pleased to listen to the questions, concerns, or feedback from our patients and visitors. Feel free to reach out to us using the contact information provided.

data.name: HospitalConnectionTitle
data.value: Hospital Contact Information

data.name: HospitalDescription
data.value:
Our hospital is equipped with modern medical technology and equipment, offering a wide range of healthcare services. We provide services in emergency care, intensive care, surgical services, internal medicine, pediatrics, and many other fields.
Our experienced and expert healthcare team is available 24 hours a day to provide the highest quality care to our patients. We offer amenities such as a cafeteria, parking, and free Wi-Fi for the comfort of our patients and visitors.
Our hospital strives to promote excellence in patient care and continuously works towards improvement in healthcare services. The health and well-being of our patients are always our top priorities.

data.name: HospitalDescriptionTitle
data.value: Definition of the Hospital

data.name: HospitalName
data.value: AKDAG Hospital

data.name: OurDoctors
data.value:
The doctors in our hospital have extensive experience and knowledge in various medical disciplines. Each one is dedicated to providing the highest quality care to our patients. Our doctors use the latest medical information and technologies to understand our patients' health issues, make accurate diagnoses, and create effective treatment plans.
Our doctors recognize that each patient is unique, with their own specific healthcare needs. Therefore, they approach each patient individually and create a personalized care plan to help each patient achieve their health goals.
Our doctors deeply care about the health and well-being of our patients and continually make efforts to promote excellence in healthcare services for our patients.

data.name: OurDoctorsTitle
data.value: Our doctors
